name: Out of the Park Baseball 20
description: Officially licensed by MLB, MiLB and the MLBPA, OOTP 20 is a baseball & strategy gaming fan's dream come true and the only game ever to win the Metacritic PC Game of the Year Award TWICE. Out of the Park Baseball 20 - Twenty Years of Excellence!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Vista/Win7/Win8.x/Win10 处理器: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: OpenGL 2.0 or newer, min 256 MB GPU memory 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Win7/Win8.x/Win10 处理器: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: OpenGL 2.0 or newer, min 256 MB GPU memory 存储空间: 需要 20 GB 可用空间
